name: Skype for Web tweaks
description: Hides some unnecessary elements and margins in Skype for Web page. In addition makes text area visible. Fixes toggle switchers and highlights failed (unsent) messages. Squared avatars and link preview tweaks.
additional_info:
7 June 2017: Fixed toggle switchers in profile preview and translation settings. Highlights failed (unsent messages). Hides footer for more space.

8 June 2017: Squared avatars, send files button (only) always visible. Some fixes.

11 June 2017: Smaller link preview. Hides description and domain. Wraps title to see whole of it.
